meanings.sent1: At the party, everyone enjoyed the cold stubbies of beer.
meanings.sent2: The bartender handed out stubbies of beer to the thirsty customers.
meanings.sent3: The fridge was full of stubbies, ready to quench our thirst.
meanings.sent4: The stubbies clinked together as friends raised a toast.
meanings.sent5: The label on the stubbies showed the brand's logo clearly.

meanings.sent1: Grandpa liked to relax on the porch with his favorite stubbies.
meanings.sent2: The aroma of the stubbies filled the room during the poker game.
meanings.sent3: The fancy party had a special corner for the stubbies enthusiasts.
meanings.sent4: The smoke from the stubbies curled in the air like a lazy snake.
meanings.sent5: The ash from the stubbies fell gently onto the ashtray.

meanings.definition: Short, thick pieces of wood or metal
meanings.sent1: The carpenter used the stubbies to reinforce the structure.
meanings.sent2: The artist welded the stubbies together to create a unique sculpture.
meanings.sent3: The stubbies were too short to reach the top shelf in the garage.
meanings.sent4: The stubbies formed a sturdy base for the table.
meanings.sent5: The stubbies were perfect for patching up the fence.

meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with colorful stubbies of various sizes.
meanings.sent2: The farmer harvested the stubbies to make space for new crops.
meanings.sent3: The stubbies in the forest provided shelter for small animals.
meanings.sent4: The stubbies swayed gently in the breeze, creating a peaceful scene.
meanings.sent5: The stubbies added a touch of green to the barren landscape.
